00055 GraphicView::GraphicView( QWidget* parent )
00056 :QAbstractItemView( parent ),
00057  m_sceneGraphRoot( 0 ),
00058  m_myRenderArea( 0 )
00059 {
00060 
00061 }
00062 
00063 GraphicView::~GraphicView()
00064 {
00065     delete m_myRenderArea;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void GraphicView::SetSceneGraph( GraphicRoot* sceneGraphRoot )
00069 {
00070 
00071     m_sceneGraphRoot =  sceneGraphRoot;
00072     m_myRenderArea = new SoQtExaminerViewer( this );
00073     m_myRenderArea->setGLRenderAction( new SoBoxHighlightRenderAction() );
00074     m_myRenderArea->setTransparencyType( SoGLRenderAction::SORTED_OBJECT_BLEND );
00075     m_myRenderArea->setSceneGraph( m_sceneGraphRoot->GetNode() );
00076 
00077     ViewCoordinateSystem( true );
00078 }
00079 
00080 SbViewportRegion GraphicView::GetViewportRegion() const
00081 {
00082         return m_myRenderArea->getViewportRegion();
00083 }
00084 
00085 SoCamera* GraphicView::GetCamera() const
00086 {
00087         return m_myRenderArea->getCamera();
00088 }

00159 void GraphicView::currentChanged( const QModelIndex & current, const QModelIndex& /*previous*/ )
00160 {
00161         if( m_sceneGraphRoot )
00162         {
00163                 m_sceneGraphRoot->DeselectAll();
00164 
00165                 SoFullPath* path;
00166                 QVariant variant = current.data(Qt::UserRole);
00167 
00168                 if ( variant.canConvert<PathWrapper>() )
00169                 {
00170                         path = static_cast< SoFullPath*>( variant.value< PathWrapper >().GetPath() );
00171                         m_sceneGraphRoot->Select( path );
00172                 }
00173 
00174                 //m_sceneGraphRoot->touch();
00175         }
00176 }
